title: North Bay Naturopathic Doctor Admits Selling Fake COVID Vaccine Cards
description: A North Bay naturopathic doctor on Wednesday pleaded guilty to selling fake COVID-19 immunization treatments and hundreds of fraudulent vaccination cards that made it seem like customers received Moderna vaccines, federal prosecutors said.
